JOB DESCRIPTION: Hello Graduates!!Hope you all are doing well..,We have come up with a Train And  Hire Program For Technical Graduates.We are hiring for Technical Graduates passed in 2018/19/20 from any Branch from PAN India for one of the biggest IT Brand in India.Job Description :Combine programming languages, tools and engineering practices to build, test, integrate, package, deploy, and release non-trivial Web apps.Designation Offered :  Product Engineer, Full Stack Developer, Software Engineer, Software Developer, Java Developer, Back-end DeveloperSalary :  Immense earning potential with a starting annual salary of INR 5 TO 8 Lacs p.a.Eligibility:*  BE/ B. Tech Any Branch, passed out in 2018,2019 and 2020 only*  60% and above in X and XII*  60% and above in graduation or equivalent degree*  No standing back papersRecruitment Procedure:* Online Coding test* Technical InterviewAfter getting selected candidates would undergo a training that would be a track specific training for 19 or 21 weeks.  The total amount for the program is 2 lakh + GST but initially you are not required to pay the entire amount. The amount required to pay for the program before getting a job is 30K + GSTOnce getting selected Candidates would give draft / online payment of 15K +GST to Block their seats . And another 15 k + GST at the time of training . So, this is  a paid training and would be conducted from virtually. And the remaining cost of the program would be incurred from the salary of the candidates within in 24 months after placement .Note* If you are applying please make sure that you are looking forward for this program and will be ready to block their seats after getting selected in coding test and interview.For further details call on the number mentioned below/ Whatsapp : Jyoti 8074081974
